item.description:
Come enjoy a day of exploring Lake Waramaug!! Kayaking, picnicing, swimming..Lake Waramaug has it all! A large, populated lake that is just awesome to play in!! Speed Boats and jet skis make it interesting but all the more fun! Meet us by the rent a kayak stand ($10 an hour ) and have some fun!!
There is a $7.00 state park fee for each car entering the park.
You must park on the side of the road to load and unload your kayak! The park ranger gets nasty if you park on the grass! :(
Rain cancells the event!
Leashed dogs are welcome in the picnic area!
It may be a drive for some...but its sooo worth it!

Directions: follow Rt. 118 to Litchfield.At the intersection of Rt.118 and Rt.202 bear left onto Rt.202. Follow Rt.202 into New Preston and take a right onto Rt.45 and than a left onto North Shore Rd. Continue around lake to the park! Its quite a trip around the lake so if you think you went the wrong way...you didn't!!

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Lake Waramaug, Kent Ct.
